name: Facebook - Dark Blue Girl by Avanish (no ads)
description:
The Dark Blue Mod
with black bg and lots of mods.
Do check it out

If you have any suggestions for improvements, feel free to comment.
IT WILL BE IMPLEMENTED!
:)
additional_info:
Hey Guys,
Show your appreciation by sending a donation

Change Log:
NEW BLACK THEME FOR CHAT
